title: Untying the Fine Knots: How to Deal with Divorce
description: The decision to divorce isn’t easy.But when you decide to do so, you wonder where to go from there. You must deal with finances, splitting ornaments and furniture, savings, earnings and property. You must deal with your own distress, with withdrawn friendships, broken family relationships and saddened children, with lawyers and courts, and an aggressive ex or a peaceful one. If you are at this point, that’s where the book begins. It tells you what’s ahead and takes you through how best to deal with your emotions, the ex, children, family, society, courts and legal matters, payments and child custody, negotiations and your very identity.Untying the fine knots tells you how to convert your separation or divorce into a fresh start to your life.
author: Madhuri Y.
